price: Masan akasa akyerε wͻn wͻ badwa mu, asan akasa akyerε wͻn wͻ kokoa mu.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّيٓ أَعۡلَنتُ لَهُمۡ وَأَسۡرَرۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِسۡرَارٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: thumma innī aʿlantu lahum wa-asrartu lahum is'rāran
